Shambler Skin Armor

armor (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 208
armor id [armor]: 37 (Shambler Skin Hauberk)
protection, body [protbody]: 9
encumbrance [enc]: 1
water breathing [waterbreathing]: 1
(air-breathing [airbr])

Requires 5W to forge (W1)

Made from the skin of a single huge Atlantian, this armor grants the wearer the ability to breathe both air and water.
